mapper.sql: quotation.id as id_quotation, satoshis, timestamp, coinPair.id as idcoinpair, final as isFinal
mapper.insert: insert into quotation (id, id_coin_by_exchange, satoshis, timestamp) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idCoinByExchange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{satoshis,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into quotation
id,
id_coin_by_exchange,
satoshis,
timestamp,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
(SELECT id FROM coin_by_exchange WHERE id_coin=#{coinByExchange.coin.id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and id_exchange=#{coinByExchange.exchange.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}),
#{satoshis,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update quotation
id_coin_by_exchange = #{idCoinByExchange,jdbcType=INTEGER},
satoshis = #{satoshis,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select 'false' as QUERYID,
from quotation INNER JOIN coin_by_exchange ON coin_by_exchange.id = quotation.id_coin_by_exchange INNER JOIN coin as coinPair ON coin_by_exchange.id_coin_pair = coinPair.id WHERE coin_by_exchange.id_coin=#{coin.id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND coin_by_exchange.id_exchange=#{exchange.id,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by timestamp desc limit 1
